name: BeeDrunk
description:
You are a hard working bee but secretly an alcoholic.

Complete your pollen collecting task but keep your blood alcohol high to avoid a lethal withdrawals!

Be careful, the more drunk you are, the harder it will be to navigate!

If it's too hard, splash into the water to sober a little bit up. Unfortunately you will drop your pollen by splashing as well.

The more drunk you are the more points you get for a single pack of pollen! Stop playing safe!

The game is pretty easy to beat once you get the hang of it but you will probably pay for this skill with a couple of strokes.

Every assets:

- Grass + bush: custom made for this game

- Bee, Flask, Flower, Hive, Lake: pixabay.com

- Sound Effects + Music: pixabay.com
